memberdef.name: REG_TEST
memberdef.initializer: { \ auto suite = std::make_shared<CLASS_NAME>(host, output_directory, config); \ test_suites.push_back(suite); \ }

memberdef.argsstring: (TestHost &host, RuntimeConfig &config, std::vector< std::shared_ptr< TestSuite > > &test_suites, const std::string &output_directory, std::shared_ptr< FTPLogger > ftp_logger)
memberdef.name: RegisterSuites
